verses.verse: My soul <S%H5315><s%> rests <S%H1747><s%> in God <S%H430><s%> alone. <S%H3444><s%> My salvation is from him.
He alone is my rock <S%H6697><s%> and my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> my fortress <S%H4869><s%>â€” I will never be greatly <S%H7227><s%> shaken. <S%H4131><s%>

How long will you assault <S%H2050><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> would all of you throw him down, <S%H7523><s%> Like a leaning <S%H5186><s%> wall, <S%H7023><s%> like a tottering <S%H1760><s%> fence? <S%H1447><s%>

They fully intend <S%H3289><s%> to throw him down <S%H5080><s%> from his lofty <S%H7613><s%> place. <S%H7521><s%> They delight in lies. <S%H3577><s%> They bless <S%H1288><s%> with their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> but they curse <S%H7043><s%> inwardly. <S%H7130><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
My soul, <S%H5315><s%> wait <S%H1826><s%> in silence for God <S%H430><s%> alone, <S%H8615><s%> for my expectation is from him.
He alone is my rock <S%H6697><s%> and my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> my fortress. <S%H4869><s%> I will not be shaken. <S%H4131><s%>
With God <S%H430><s%> is my salvation <S%H3468><s%> and my honor. <S%H3519><s%> The rock <S%H6697><s%> of my strength, <S%H5797><s%> and my refuge, <S%H4268><s%> is in God. <S%H430><s%>

Trust <S%H982><s%> in him at all times, <S%H6256><s%> you people. <S%H5971><s%> Pour out <S%H8210><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him. <S%H430><s%> God is a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for us. <S%H5542><s%> Selah.

Surely men <S%H120><s%> of low degree are just a breath, <S%H1892><s%> and men <S%H376><s%> of high degree are a lie. <S%H3577><s%> In <S%H5927><s%> the balances <S%H3976><s%> they will go up. <S%H3162><s%> They are together lighter than a breath. <S%H1892><s%>

Don't <S%H982><s%> trust in oppression. <S%H6233><s%> Don't <S%H1891><s%> become vain in robbery. <S%H1498><s%> If riches <S%H2428><s%> increase, <S%H5107><s%> don't <S%H7896><s%> set your heart on them. <S%H3820><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> once; <S%H259><s%> twice <S%H8147><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H2098><s%> that power <S%H5797><s%> belongs to God. <S%H430><s%>
Also to you, <S%H136><s%> Lord, belongs loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> for you reward <S%H7999><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according to his work. <S%H4639><s%>
